metadata.description: Golden set for validating Zentropy Scout scoring algorithm. REQ-008 section 11.2 specifies a target of 50 curated entries with human-labeled scores. Current: 5 seed entries representing diverse scoring scenarios.

entries.persona_summary: Senior Python developer with 8 years experience in backend systems, API design, and PostgreSQL. Strong in async programming, FastAPI, and cloud deployments. Looking to stay in senior IC roles.
entries.job_summary: Senior Backend Engineer at fintech startup. Requires Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, AWS. 5+ years experience. Building payment processing APIs.
entries.notes: Near-perfect technical match. Low stretch because already senior and not seeking management or new tech stack.

entries.persona_summary: Junior frontend developer with 1.5 years React experience. Completed bootcamp, built 3 portfolio projects. Eager to learn backend and grow toward full-stack role.
entries.job_summary: Full-Stack Developer at mid-size SaaS company. Requires React, Node.js, PostgreSQL. 3+ years experience preferred. Opportunity to work across the stack.
entries.notes: Underqualified on experience but has relevant React skills. High stretch because role offers backend exposure aligned with growth goals.

entries.persona_summary: Data scientist with 5 years experience in Python, pandas, scikit-learn. PhD in statistics. Looking to transition into ML engineering with focus on production systems.
entries.job_summary: Machine Learning Engineer at AI startup. Requires MLOps, Kubernetes, Python, model deployment. Experience with production ML systems required.
entries.notes: Strong ML fundamentals but lacks production/MLOps experience. High stretch aligns with stated goal of moving to ML engineering.

entries.persona_summary: DevOps engineer with 6 years experience in Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS, CI/CD. Currently a team lead managing 4 engineers. Wants to stay hands-on technical.
entries.job_summary: Engineering Manager at Series B startup. Requires strong technical background, people management experience, hiring skills. Managing team of 8 engineers.
entries.notes: Has relevant leadership experience but role is more management-focused than desired. Low stretch because moving away from stated hands-on preference.

entries.persona_summary: Career changer from marketing (7 years) who completed a coding bootcamp 6 months ago. Built projects in JavaScript, React, Node.js. Seeking first developer role.
entries.job_summary: Junior Software Developer at consultancy. Requires JavaScript fundamentals, willingness to learn, strong communication skills. Entry-level friendly, client-facing work.
entries.notes: Good fit for entry-level role. Marketing background is actually an asset for client-facing consultancy. Moderate stretch with room to grow technically.
